MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: SELECT p.FirstName, p.LastName, a.City, cd.Detail FROM Person p JOIN ContactDetail cd ON cd.PersonId = p.Id JOIN ContactDetailType on cdt ON cdt.Id = cd.TypeId JOIN Address a ON a.PersonId = p.Id
